comments.body:
:tada:  **Fun fact**  :tada: 
about this `_` within action texts like `Checkout and _Rebase Branch Onto `
(that probably only me wasn't aware of)
___

It is better to see the context - the context menu. 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19799111/81965329-31605600-9618-11ea-8ac6-c9dbcdbb6513.png)

`_` underlines the following letter. It indicates the key shortcut to perform an action within the context menu. 

So in the example presented above:
- pressing **R** - performs `Rollback`
- pressing **D** - performs `Delete`

We should be aware of that to **avoid duplicate definitions**.
